author: ankitchiplunkar
content:
Hey everyone,

We did an EIP7702 whiteboarding session at ETHCC, and want to propose some changes to the current spec. 
Writeup: https://hackmd.io/@S9AwbucvTS6GYodLz-G1SQ/S102UtTwA
The proposed changes, reduce work required to manage DOS, enables new use-cases and  supports ephemeral SCAs.

comments welcome
